title: Announced Job Cuts Hit 1.17 Million In 2025 – 54 Percent Higher Than Last Year
description: It is getting very hard to deny that the U.S. economy is moving in the wrong direction.  Yesterday, ADP reported that the U.S. economy shed tens of thousands of jobs last month.  Today, Challenger, Gray & Christmas is reporting that U.S. employers announced a…
